subject: Re: Methods that does not return value
msgSnippet: Rick, It worked! You are a genious!  You don t know what this means to me! After weeks of trying to figure it out .... it finally works. Thanks soo much!! I
messageBody:
Rick,

It worked!
You are a genious! You don't know what this means to me! After weeks
of trying to figure it out .... it finally works.

Thanks soo much!!
I really appreciate it!

Lily.

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, Rick Berman <rick.berman@a...> wrote:
> J. B.,
>
> You're quite welcome.
>
> Sometimes you just have to look at the code and listen
> to what it's trying to say (to mix my metaphors).
>
> It certainly wasn't due to VAJ knowledge on my part.
> The closest (very tongue-in-cheek) I've ever come to
> VAJ was a few peeks at the the Smalltalk VA back in my
> ParcPlace Systems days where it was a key competitor.
>
> Rick
>
> --- "J. B. Rainsberger" <jbrains@r...> wrote:
> >
> > Wow.
> >
> > Thanks, Rick, for that exceptionally practical
> > insight. Sometimes we can't see the forest for the
> > trees. Since I haven't used VAJ since early 2001, I
> > would never have made the connection.
> >
> > Take care.
> >
> >
> > J. B. Rainsberger,
> > President, Diaspar Software Services
> > Let's write software that people understand.
> > http://www.diasparsoftware.com/
> > telephone: +1 416 791-8603
> >
